title: When will Riot fix Mac sound/fps bugs?
body: The sound and fps bugs on the mac client have been an issue for about a month now and its incredibly annoying having to play with no sound. When will riot release a fix to this issue because I cant really play lol that much anymore..

replies.body:
Hey Uakari - 

We are hoping to have a fix ready for Patch 6.8.
Any update? Will 6.8 have a fix?
second.... a month later and nothing? It's not just sol. It's any large team fight with lots of sounds. aka aram or poro or any tf in SR.

they are not going to fix it. 
i found that banning sol in game is helpful in minimizing sound issue.
